definition: to host (a dinner)/to treat/to pick up the check
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

sentences.english: Let's have no more of this.
sentences.chinese: 我們別再爭了，今天我作東。

sentences.english: It seems that pollination also involves certain chance factors.
sentences.chinese: 但稻作東傳也不能排除其偶然性因素。

sentences.english: Now remember this is to be my treat, so I’ll pay for everything.
sentences.chinese: 別忘記這次由我作東，一切帳都由我付。
